content.main:
We believe that happier, kinder communities create a better world for everyone. The Public Happiness Movement brings together people who want to take real action, whether locally or globally, to spread positivity and solve issues that matter to them.

Here, you'll find like-minded people, tools to take action, and a movement that grows stronger with each small act of kindness.
content.quote: If its not fun, its not sustainable!
content.author: Gary Lachance

second_section.title: A Kinder, Fairer, and Happier World

content.main:
In a world addicted to division, we aim to show the power of human and community connection. With a shared focus and effective, science-backed tools, a united community is more powerful than those who seek to divide us for their own selfish goals.

By coming together and taking action, we create real change, one step at a time.

Imagine an economy that rewards what really matters - kindness, connection, and community well-being. That's why we're experimenting with PHM tokens, our innovative cryptocurrency that rewards people for creating positive change
content.quote: Anyone who benefits society should be rewarded. That's what economic systems were created to do. How much is PHM token worth? It's worth whatever our community collectively values it at, which is how much value you believe we are creating in the world
content.author: Andy Tulett
